help-file.title: "REJUVENATE MINOR"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <victim> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Enchantment
This spell temporarily reduces the victim's age with the amount dependent on the proficiency of the caster. The reduction in age carries all the benefits and detriments normally associated with being younger. This is a temporary version of "Rejuvenate Major."
